posts.title: Air Fort Inflatable Tent
posts.content: Build a kickass fort in mere seconds using this air fort inflatable tent. The tent works with any portable fan to instantly inflate and provide your little ones with a cool, secluded, and breezy hangout that they can set up anywhere.

posts.title: Snoop Dogg’s Cookbook
posts.content: Treat your taste buds to a delectable treat from Snoop Dogg’s Cookbook any time the munchies strike! It’s packed with 50 mouth-watering recipes from Tha Doggfather himself, with OG culinary staples like fried bologna sandwiches and baked mac and cheese.

posts.title: A Can Of Whoop Ass
posts.content: Bring your threats to fruition by literally opening up a can of whoop ass on somebody! This awesome gag gift comes with a highly detailed and informative label complete with comical graphics and a list on ingredients that include “1/2 cup of pain” and “1 oz of hardcore”.

posts.title: The Relaxation Capsule
posts.content: Let your stress instantly melt away inside the relaxation capsule. The heated water mattress, pre-programmed music and light show inside this completely heat, light, and sound proof capsule will effectively help reduce tension, anxiety, depression and fatigue.

posts.title: Gerber Ghoststrike Fixed Blade Knife
posts.content: Ensure you’re never caught unprepared by keeping the Gerber Ghoststrike fixed blade knife handy. Expertly crafted from 420HC steel with a black ceramic coating, this American-made knife features a compact skeletal frame that can be discreetly carried.

posts.title: NERF Sniper Rifle
posts.content: The Nerf sniper rifle is yet another Nerf toy that we agonizingly wish they made while we were still growing up. You can have an all out sniper war with these guns, but the Nerf sniper rifle is an especially great gift for office warfare.

posts.title: Battle Of Helm’s Deep LEGO Set
posts.content: Recreate one of the most epic scenes in the entire Lord of the Rings trilogy using the Battle of Helm’s Deep LEGO set. This  1,368 piece set comes with everything necessary to construct the iconic fortress and pit the forces of good and evil against each other.

posts.title: The No Pressure Head Bed
posts.content: Sleep better than ever before by resting your tired noggin on the no pressure head bed. This one of a kind pillow features a patented hyper-elastic polymer that’s arranged into small triangles to provide core lateral strength, so it won’t ever go flat or sink.

posts.title: Dango Tactical Wallet
posts.content: Get more use out of your everyday carry by placing your money and documents inside the Dango tactical wallet. It’s designed to house up to 12 cards and comes with a removable high carbon stainless steel multi-tool with over 14 built-in functions.

posts.title: Savage Choices Party Game
posts.content: Who ever thought that ruining people’s lives could be so much fun? Savage Choices is the party game where players select a character card and attribute cards and go up against a judge in order to try and convince him to live a life as their character.

posts.title: Ultra Realistic Animal Face Ski Masks
posts.content: Turn heads as you shred down the slopes by staying warm with one of these ultra realistic animal face ski masks. Each of these windproof and dustproof masks are breathable, quick-drying, and are emblazoned with a vivid animal print complete with cute 3D ears.

posts.title: Ten Person Cabin Tent
posts.content: Rough it in the wild with your family in absolute luxury by lodging inside the ten person cabin tent. This massive tent features built-in dividers for added privacy and comes with a cozy little front porch ideal for relaxing in.
